sense.gloss: furigana, kana printed above or next to kanji to indicate pronunciation

sdata.j: このサイトでは↑日本語↑↓にほんご↓は|ふりがな|がついてスペースを↑取↑↓と↓るので、↑関心↑↓かんしん↓のない↑人↑↓ひと↓にとっては↑結構↑↓けっこう↓ジャマなんじゃないかと↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓してしまう。
sdata.e: I worry that, because the Japanese lines in this site are written with furigana, they take up a lot of space, and the people who don't even care about them in the first place might find them annoying.

sdata.j: |ふりがな|のある↑読↑↓よ↓みやすい↑漫画↑↓まんが↓を↑探↑↓さが↓してる。
sdata.e: I'm looking for an easy-to-read manga with furigana.
